@graph.name: How to Install Optizen PRO and Enterprise Features
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide for manually installing advanced Optizen features on your Shopify store

supply.name: Shopify Store
supply.description: Active Shopify store with admin access

step.name: Send Support Request
step.text: Navigate to our Contact form and submit a support request for installation

step.name: Include Store URL
step.text: Include your complete .myshopify.com URL in the support request

step.name: Approve Access Request
step.text: We will send a limited permission access request that you need to approve

step.name: Installation Completion
step.text: Once approved, our team will complete the installation of PRO and Enterprise features

mainEntity.name: Do I need manual installation for all Optizen features?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, if you plan on only using the AI feature, the standard install from the Shopify app store will work out of the box. Manual installation is only required for PRO and Enterprise features.

mainEntity.name: How long does the manual installation process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: The manual installation typically takes 1-2 business days after you approve the access request. The approval process itself usually takes a few minutes.

mainEntity.name: What permissions does Optizen need for installation?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen requires limited permissions to install PRO and Enterprise features. We will send you a specific access request detailing exactly what permissions are needed.

mainEntity.name: Can I install PRO features myself?

acceptedAnswer.text: Currently, PRO and Enterprise features require manual installation by our support team. This ensures proper configuration and optimal performance.

mainEntity.name: What information do I need to include in my support request?

acceptedAnswer.text: You need to include your complete .myshopify.com URL in the support request. This allows our team to identify your store and send the appropriate access request.

@graph.name: Optizen Installation Terminology
@graph.description: Key terms and definitions related to Optizen installation process

hasDefinedTerm.name: Manual Installation
hasDefinedTerm.description: Installation process that requires support team intervention for PRO and Enterprise features

hasDefinedTerm.name: Limited Permission Access
hasDefinedTerm.description: Restricted access request that allows installation of specific features without full admin privileges

hasDefinedTerm.name: Standard Install
hasDefinedTerm.description: Regular installation from Shopify app store that includes basic AI features

hasDefinedTerm.name: .myshopify.com URL
hasDefinedTerm.description: The unique Shopify store URL format required for installation requests
